pkgmetadata.longdescription: Model Wrappers for Poisson Regression // Bindings for Poisson regression models for use with the 'parsnip' package. Models include simple generalized linear models, Bayesian models, and zero-inflated Poisson models (Zeileis, Kleiber, and Jackman (2008) doi:10.18637/jss.v027.i08).
